title: Motley Fool Money: 08.07.2009
description: What do better-than-expected jobs numbers mean for investors? Are Apple and Google gearing up for a fight? Has China gone too far in its effort to deter investing scams? In this installment of Motley Fool Money, we tackle those questions, share three stocks on our radar, and offer up some fatherly advice.
